order

Class DishController

  • java.lang.Object
    • order.DishController

  • public class DishController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is for representing a dish in the branch menu controller each dish load its image and set label according to dish details
    Since:
    01.01.2022
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Matan Weisberg
